**Advance Contract Award Notice**
=====================================

*   **Reference Number**: CB-305-86169724
*   **Amendment Number**: 4
*   **Solicitation Number**: PR149597/1000473740
*   **Publication Date**: February 12, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 27, 2024 at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2024

**Overview**
-----------

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is soliciting the rental services of an outdoor shooting range in Sherbrooke, Quebec, for the training of border services officers. The contract period is anticipated to be one year, with an option to renew for up to four additional one-year periods.

**Objectives**
------------

*   To rent a secure, comfortable, and well-maintained outdoor shooting range close to the City of Sherbrooke
*   To provide a safe environment for training sessions, including access to training rooms, washrooms, and dining areas
*   To provide firearms training to border services officers in line with CBSA policies

**Key Requirements**
-----------------

*   The contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary equipment, personnel, and facilities for the shooting range.
*   The contractor will need to accommodate CBSA training requirements, with possible bookings at variable times between April and October.
*   The contractor will be required to provide safety procedures to ensure a secure environment for training sessions.
*   The expected usage frequency is approximately 20 days per year.

**Eligibility and Submission Instructions**
--------------------------------------

Suppliers who are fully qualified and available to provide the services described in this notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

To submit a tender, send your statement of capabilities to [marie-pier.leblanc@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-pier.leblanc@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca.)
Available documentation can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
